p: The analysis of all the data are conducted with the software of IBM SPSS Statistics for Windows, version 20 (IBM Corp., Armonk, NY, USA). Subsequently, all data obtained are expressed with proper characteristics, for instance, median, mean, percentage and standard deviation. Continuous and categorical variables are analyzed using Ï‡ 2-tests and independent t tests, respectively. Intention-to-treat analysis is used for the outcome assessments. P value less than .05 indicates that there is statistical significance.
